original_text: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones, he hath covered me with ashes.
korean_text: 조약돌로 내 이들을 꺾으시고 재로 나를 덮으셨도다

sentences.original_text: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그 또한 자갈로 내 이를 부셨으며

sentences.original_text: he hath covered me with ashes
